content.text:
# Ayumi Hagiwara

is a Japanese athlete specialising in long-distance running events. She won the bronze medal in the 10,000 metres at the 2014 Asian Games.
Competition record
{|
|-
!colspan="6"|Representing
|-

|Asian Championships
|Pune, India
|bgcolor=cc9966|3rd
|10,000 m
|32:47.44
|-
|2014
|Asian Games
|Incheon, South Korea
|bgcolor=cc9966|3rd
|10,000 m
|31:55.67
|}
Personal bests
Outdoor
*5000 metres – 15:24.56 (Yamaguchi 2014)
*10,000 metres – 31:41.80 (Yamaguchi 2014)
*15 kilometres – 49:35 (Matsue 2014)
*20 kilometres – 1:06:42 (Matsue 2014)
*Half marathon – 1:10:17 (Matsue 2014)
